SpellChargeTime.Description: The time it takes to charge the spell, to then be able to activate it.

Cooldown_ChargeThresholdInSeconds.Description: The threshold in seconds for the charge to reach for any cooldown to be triggered. (to prevent punishing players when tapping the ability button)

Cooldown_IntroCooldown.Description: The cooldown that is applied at the start of the match, after the intro sequence is completed

Cooldown_ActivatedSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell is cast.

Cooldown_CancelledSpell.Description: The cooldown that is applied on the spell if the spell was cancelled (i.e. charge has been started but spell was not confirmed to be cast)

ExitInteractionTime_ActivatedSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell has been activated.

ExitInteractionTime_CancelledSpell.Description: The time it takes to exit the interaction when the spell is cancelled (has not been activated).

Flying_SpeedCurve_TransitionTime.Description: The time it takes to transition from 0 to 1 in the flying speed curve.

Flying_FOV_TransitionTime.Description: The time it will take to transition from the current FOV to the target FOV modifier.

Flying_YawScaling.Description: The yaw scaling value that will be applied when the killer is in the flying state.

Flying_MaximumFlyingTime.Description: The maximum flying time the killer is allowed to fly for. Once this time is reached, the spell interaction ends.

Flying_VaultableCollisions_LingerTimeAft.Description: The time the collisions stay disable after the flying state ends

Flying_TimeBeforeFlyEndWarning.Description: The time in seconds before the fly end audio cue is triggered before the end of flying due to length

Flying_TimeTooSlowToStopFlying.Description: The maximum time a survivor is allowed to be too slow before ending the flying state.

AfterFlying_TimeToDeccelerate.Description: The amount of time it takes to deccelerate to 0 velocity after ending the fly

AfterFlying_FrictionOverride.Description: The override value for the friction when ending the fly. Lower number means the killer will glide further after the fly

AfterFlying_BrakingDecelerationOverride.Description: The override value for the braking deceleration when ending the fly. Lower number means the killer will glide further after the fly

AfterFlying_MinimumVelocityForDecelerati.Description: The minimum velocity that the killer can have for the after flying velocity override mechanic to be active.

Counter_AuraRevealLingerTime.Description: The time the aura reveal on the killer will linger once the killer ends its flying state

Addon_02_AddedFlyingTime.Description: The amount of time (seconds) added from Addon 02 (this amount will be added to the Flying_MaximumFlyingTime)

Addon_06_EndFlyModifierAdditive.Description: The value that will be added to the fly end duration

Addon_11_TerrorRadiusAdditiveModifier.Description: The value added (in cm) to the killer's default terror radius distance

Addon_11_StatusEffectLifetime.Description: The duration (in seconds) that the terror radius modifier status effect will remain active for once the fly spell is triggered.

Addon_20_BlockWindowDuration.Description: The amount of time the vault window will be blocked for after the killer passes through it

ScoreEvent_NumberOfActivationTimesBefore.Description: The amount of times that fly spell can be activated before giving a reduced amount of bloodpoints.

ScoreEvent_ReducedScoreEventPercentage.Description: The reduced bloodpoint percentage given to the activate fly score event if triggered too many times
